parameters.name: Traverseflag
parameters.description: True to traverse down into all dependent files, false for only the highest level within the dependencies

parameters.name: Searchflag
parameters.description: True to apply the current search criteria, false to return the dependent file information as it was stored

parameters.name: AddReadOnlyInfo
parameters.description: True to obtain read-only information with each dependent file

title: IModelDoc2.IGetNumDependencies2
description: Gets the number of strings returned by IModelDoc2::IGetDependencies2.
signature:
System.Int32 IGetNumDependencies2( 
   System.Boolean
Traverseflag
,
   System.Boolean
Searchflag
,
   System.Boolean
AddReadOnlyInfo
)

parameters.name: Traverseflag
parameters.description: True to traverse down into all dependent files, false for only the highest level within the dependencies

parameters.name: Searchflag
parameters.description: True to apply the current search criteria, false to return the dependent file information as it was stored

parameters.name: AddReadOnlyInfo
parameters.description: True to obtain read-only information with each dependent file

returns: Number of strings returned by IModelDoc2::IGetDependencies2
